summary: While The Rolling Stones rehearse "Sympathy for the Devil" in the studio, Godard reflects on 1968 society, politics and culture through five different vignettes.
cast: Sean Lynch|Mick Jagger|Brian Jones|Keith Richards|Charlie Watts|Bill Wyman|Anne Wiazemsky|Iain Quarrier|Frankie Dymon|Danny Daniels|Ilario Bisi-Pedro|Roy Stewart|Linbert Spencer|Tommy Ansah|Michael McKay|Rudi Patterson|Mark Matthew|Karl Lewis|Bernard Boston|Nike Arrighi|Fran√ßoise Pascal|Joanna David|Monica Walters|Glenna Forster-Jones|Elizabeth Long|Jeannette Wild|Harry Douglas|Colin Cunningham|Graham Peet|Matthew Knox|Barbara Coleridge|The Rolling Stones|Marianne Faithfull|James Fox|Nicky Hopkins|Clifton Jones|Anita Pallenberg
title: Sympathy for the Devil
